attributes.action: Make it a mandatory requirement that all vehicles used in connection with a business to be fitted with a Tachograph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fitting of Tachographs will aid road safety by recording speed and number of hours being driven by an employee.

Employee's being pressured into working excessive long hours will have evidence.

It should help reduce the number of accidents through speeding and tiredness.
